quotes.author: The Buddha
quotes.quote: There is no fear for one whose mind is not filled with desires.

quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quotes.quote: In the end we retain from our studies only that which we practically apply.

quotes.author: Forrest Church
quotes.quote: Do what you can. Want what you have. Be who you are.

quotes.author: Charles Henry Parkhurst
quotes.quote: The heart has eyes which the brain knows nothing of.

quotes.author: Ana√Øs Nin
quotes.quote: Dreams pass into the reality of action. From the actions stems the dream again; and this interdependence produces the highest form of living.

quotes.author: Walt Whitman
quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.

quotes.author: Frank Abagnale
quotes.quote: We all grow up. Hopefully, we get wiser. Age brings wisdom, and fatherhood changes one's life completely.
